episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

6.title: Thou Shalt Put It Together

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: The seven remaining girls have to "put together" two matching swing sets at a day care center.

7.title: Of Two Evils, Choose the Less

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: The ladies make a breakthrough in accepting one another, but Ricki presents a choice that could damage all of the progress they' ve made.

8.title: Ride Em Cowgirl

11.title: Thou Shalt Be Fully Charmed

11.plot: The final 3 girls receive a surprise visit from their loved ones, and they all partake in a special therapy session with Dr. Alli.

1.title: One Bad Apple

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Fourteen of Bret Michael's Rock of Love rejects are admitted to Charm School. Head Mistress, Sharon Osbourne, plans to transform these tawdry groupies into classy women of importance. With $100,000 on the line, old feuds are reignited, bad habits revisited and, before the night is over, at least one girl is expelled. School is in session!

2.title: Quit Yer Beaching

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: An ominous guest from the first season of Charm School pays a surprise visit to the ladies and "drills" them on the finer points of teamwork. This lesson is quickly forgotten and tempers flare when two girls refuse to pull their weight. Will the girls band together to pass their first test?

3.title: The Trashion Show

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: The girls attempt to makeover three of their fashion-challenged classmates. But when the rules are "slashed," they must be prepared to shine even under the nastiest of circumstances. Tensions are high, and as a battle ensues, it's clear that their outfits aren't the only thing in need of a makeover.

4.title: Every Little Thing She Does Is Tragic

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: The ladies team up for their toughest challenge yet - to create, style and showcase a band for famed manager of The Police, Miles Copeland. But before the first note is played, the girls are already playing each other. And when it's all said and done, Sharon makes a shocking revelation that turns the tables on everyone.

5.title: Royally Screwed

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: The nine remaining ladies must put their etiquette lesson to the test by entertaining a Duchess. But when presented with a lengthy and demanding royal protocol, the girls realize they are "royally" screwed. The ladies must to do some fancy maneuvering to save themselves when Sharon reveals a shocking twist - this time, the girls decide who's up for expulsion.

6.title: T and A PSA

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Sharon treats the girls to some of the finer things in life - a wine, cigar and liquor tasting. However, an impromptu breath-alyzer proves that moderation is a word some of these ladies fail to understand. And when challenged to shoot a Public Service Announcement on the dangers of drinking - not all the ladies are up to the task.

7.title: Fugly Dating

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Sharon has her hands full teaching the seven remaining girls the right way to find love. But what happens when the girls have to win over three eligible bachelors with just their personalities and not their boobs? Insults aren't the only things being hurled when a wild night of fun leads to one of Charm School's prettiest girls getting very, very ugly.

8.title: Poetic Justice

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: After last week's blow out, the girls are in dire need of a lesson in anger management. The final six must tap into their creative sides and take their negative emotions to the stage. But with bitter resentments at an all time high, one girl gets far more stage time than the rest.

9.title: Battle of the Brands

episode of.title: Rock of Love: Charm School (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: The final four girls compete to brand themselves by creating an original t-shirt for designer Christian Audigier. The ladies struggle to keep their eyes on the prize as long-kept secrets are exposed to Sharon. The pressure becomes too much for one girl, whose downward spiral nearly causes her to eliminate herself. In the end, Sharon expels one girl as the final three move one step closer toward graduating Charm School and winning $100,000.
